channel.title: Vicious Revolution - Stop with the remakes already! Finally, something unique!
channel.description:
So I joined Vicioious Revolution a week or two ago, and I've decided that their current Hybrid PvP base just isn't cutting it. We've been having memories issues, so in stead of fixing it all we've decided just to move to a new base entirely. This base has quite a bit of work into it, still has ways to go. We currently have 99% 508 maps fixed by Penor for us. So we have potential for lots of minigames which I plan on starting here soon once I figure out how Clan Wars USED to work. If any one can explain that to me, I will know what im aiming for. :P
Media: Non Animated [IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/loginscreen.png[/img]
Animated Background - Credits to the Keldagrim Release :P http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ZaIf4ZQ1KQ
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/Banksearching1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/Banksearching2.png[/img]
New 634 Char Models [IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/charappearance.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/edgevillhomebefore.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/randommessage.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/yellandloginmessage.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/coolcapes.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/donatorsytem.png[/img]
A tradeable ticket which gives the opener Donator Status, has a "Are you sure?" option aswell :P [IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/donatorticket.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/easterbasket.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/fallenangel.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/goldenkatana.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/havensfury.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/titanswaraxe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/scythestance.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/scythestance1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/polypore.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/mapdata1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/mapdata1-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/objectclicking.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gx7V1qe0920
This server has a lot of time and money put into it and we plan on putting more time and money into it. We're soon getting Galkon's Clan Chat system, a 100% world map system that loads and closes within the application, a 100% Grand Exchange system, and 100% summoning.
At beta, we have a few people testing for bugs, but it would be helpful if everyone else who has the time will :P. Thanks for your time!

item.title: Vicious Revolution - Stop with the remakes already! Finally, something unique!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Updates: getting construction made by asshole
Added wildy ditch features
added more maps
Fixed a lot of npc spawns
added global drop system

Just picked up Clawz Fury as a temporary developer just for the extra help! Should be releasing here in a month or so. We want to see how the 2007 runescape coming back effects the RSPS player base.

Read full topic

item.source: Vicious Revolution - Stop with the remakes already! Finally, something unique!

item.title: Vicious Revolution - Stop with the remakes already! Finally, something unique!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:52, topic:465550”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=570847.msg4206321#msg4206321 date=1358978830]

[quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=570847.msg4206308#msg4206308 date=1358977682]

[quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=570847.msg4206217#msg4206217 date=1358970034]

Do something useful with that server sided cache loading and load object, item, npc, etc definitions so you don’t have to loop through a file as large as Uranus to find what you’re looking for.

and if you’re really good you’ll use JAGGRAB and a proper login server.


[/quote]Since you’re so cool, you should come do it for me.

He has some other work to do besides that.

Which is?
[/quote]You make laugh Ryley if you still work with that idiot.

@Soulcist, I know. Luka got ratted and the webhost was hacked. We’re recovering files soon.

I don’t work with him, I left this shitty scene months ago.

Which was why I asked what I ‘had’ to do. I haven’t even spoken to Artem since I stopped.

Also, he really isn’t an idiot, I don’t see why you need to label him that just because you two have issues.
[/quote]Its just our thing to do, we love labeling each other.

anyways…

[quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=570847.msg4205312#msg4205312 date=1358847647]

[quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=570847.msg4205298#msg4205298 date=1358840575]
Do something useful with that server sided cache loading and load object, item, npc, etc definitions so you don’t have to loop through a file as large as Uranus to find what you’re looking for.

and if you’re really good you’ll use JAGGRAB and a proper login server.


[/quote]Since you’re so cool, you should come do it for me.

[/quote][/quote]

Updates: 653 Items Added
Fixed a few bugs server sided
Fixed a lot of mixing mapdata since I learned how to dump

Read full topic

Also, he really isn’t an idiot, I don’t see why you need to label him that just because you two have issues.

[/quote]

Yes sir. Now set your Client’s Memory to Low and see if it takes out those grass patches so they don’t stick out of the snow.[/quote]I like the grass sticking out though.

Update: Bank Tabs have made their way in.

Update:
Bank Pins have been added
JSon saving has been added
Home has been Moved
Commands handled through hash maps are implemented
Farming has been added
Renamed everything
Bank Tabs completed
